attributes.action: take all possible steps to ensure that the inquest into the deaths of Diana, Princess of Wales and Dodi Fayed is conducted with total transparency and with all available evidence being made available to the jury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There can be no faith in the British justice system unless the inquest is conducted with total transparency and no attempt whatsoever is made to conceal evidence from or influence, intimidate or rig the composition of the jury in any way.

All unanswered questions must be adequately addressed, otherwise the British public will never accept the official version of events.
